comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
The Victory Arch depicted in the photo was a temporary structure erected in Madison Square Park at the conclusion of World War I to honor New York's war dead. It would later be dismantled.

Here is another photo of the arch in the US National Archives Flickr photostream.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/usnationalarchives/5008202411/]
